com.stormpath.sdk.application
Interface CreateApplicationRequestBuilder

public interface CreateApplicationRequestBuilder

A Builder to construct CreateApplicationRequests.

Since:
0.8
See Also:
TenantActions.createApplication(CreateApplicationRequest)

Method Summary
 CreateApplicationRequest build()
          Creates a new CreateApplicationRequest instance based on the current builder state.
 CreateApplicationRequestBuilder createDirectory()
          Directive to also create a new Directory for the new Application's needs.
 CreateApplicationRequestBuilder createDirectoryNamed(String name)
          Directive to also create a new Directory (with the specified directoryName for the new Application's needs.
 

Method Detail

createDirectory

CreateApplicationRequestBuilder createDirectory()
Directive to also create a new Directory for the new Application's needs. The new Directory will automatically be assigned as the Application's default login source.

The directory will be automatically named based on heuristics to ensure a guaranteed unique name based on the application. If you want to specify the Directory's name, use the createDirectoryNamed(String) method.

Returns:
the builder instance for method chaining.
See Also:
createDirectoryNamed(String)

createDirectoryNamed

CreateApplicationRequestBuilder createDirectoryNamed(String name)
Directive to also create a new Directory (with the specified directoryName for the new Application's needs. The new Directory will automatically be assigned as the Application's default login source.

If you don't care about the new Directory's name and want a reasonable default assigned automatically, don't call this method - call createDirectory() instead.

Returns:
the builder instance for method chaining.
See Also:
createDirectory()

build

CreateApplicationRequest build()
Creates a new CreateApplicationRequest instance based on the current builder state.

Returns:
a new CreateApplicationRequest instance based on the current builder state.
